name: Ourania Magissa
description:
This is a very early prototype for a game I'm working on.  It is going to be an RPG with turn-based combat, but the battle system is not ready yet. In this version you can just walk around and talk to NPCs. Not a lot of content yet, but if it looks interesting go ahead and check it out. Currently there is only a Windows build, but if there is some big demand for it, I might support other platforms, but its not considered a priority at this point.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move.  Use E or Left Mouse to interact if you see a red exclamation. Use E or Left Mouse to advance dialogue boxes. Use Z to lower music volume or X to increase volume. Press Space at any time to immediately quit to desktop. Use esc to toggle instruction box.

If you want to support development of this project you can donate here:
https://ko-fi.com/maxmichael99548

You can also help just by telling your friends to take a look.
